'''"Fine Sand in Warm Weather"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Fine Sand in Warm Weather" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] after defeating a [[Treasure Hoarder]] camp in [[Gavireh Lajavard]]. This area of the map is unlocked during {{Quest|As the Khvarena's Light Shows}}.
